flashCardData.definitionOfWord: (often with to) to put (one thing) to or with (another)
flashCardData.example_1: He added some water to his whisky.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to say that one will do or allow something
flashCardData.example_1: He agreed to our request.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: not to forbid or prevent
flashCardData.example_1: Smoking is not allowed inside the restaurant.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to come into view
flashCardData.example_1: A man suddenly appeared round the corner.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to put a question
flashCardData.example_1: He asked me what the time was.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to qualify or take a job as
flashCardData.example_1: She became a doctor.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to come or bring, into being, to start
flashCardData.example_1: The meeting began early.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to trust (a person), accepting what he says as true
flashCardData.example_1: I believe you.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to make (something or someone) come (to or towards a place)
flashCardData.example_1: I’ll bring plenty of food with me

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to form or construct from parts
flashCardData.example_1: build a bridge/house/bookcase.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to get (something) by exchanging it for money
flashCardData.example_1: Where did you buy that tie?

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to give a name to
flashCardData.example_1: My name is Alexander, but I’m called Sandy by my friends.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to take from one place etc to another
flashCardData.example_1: She carried the child over the river.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to make (something) happen; to bring about; to be the means of
flashCardData.example_1: He caused me to drop my suitcase.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to make or become different
flashCardData.example_1: They have changed the time of the train.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to move etc towards the person speaking or writing, or towards the place being referred to by him
flashCardData.example_1: Have any letters come for me?

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to feel inclined towards
flashCardData.example_1: I’m considering leaving this job.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to go on being, doing etc; to last or keep on
flashCardData.example_1: He will continue in his present job

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to cause to exist; to make
flashCardData.example_1: How was the earth created?

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to (cause to) make up one’s mind
flashCardData.example_1: I have decided to retire.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to give an account of in words; to tell in words what something or someone is like
flashCardData.example_1: He described what had happened.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to acquire gradually
flashCardData.example_1: He developed the habit of getting up early.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to perform an activity concerning something
flashCardData.example_1: We need to do the garden – it’s becoming overgrown.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to make a picture or pictures (of), usually with a pencil, crayons etc
flashCardData.example_1: During his stay in hospital he drew a great deal.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to think of as likely to happen or come
flashCardData.example_1: We expect her on tomorrow’s train.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: (often with over) to go down to the ground etc from an upright position, usually by accident
flashCardData.example_1: She tripped and fell (over).

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to become aware of (something) by the sense of touch
flashCardData.example_1: She felt his hand on her shoulder.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to come upon or meet with accidentally or after searching
flashCardData.example_1: Look what I’ve found!

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to go or come after
flashCardData.example_1: I will follow (you).

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to (manage to) move, go, take, put etc
flashCardData.example_1: I got the book down from the shelf.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to cause to have
flashCardData.example_1: My aunt gave me a book for Christmas.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to walk, travel, move etc
flashCardData.example_1: He is going across the field.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to take place or occur; to occur by chance
flashCardData.example_1: What happened next?

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: (also have got) to hold or possess (something which belongs to oneself or to someone else)
flashCardData.meaning: sở hữu hoặc có cái gì
flashCardData.example_1: I have a book of yours at home.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to (be able to) receive (sounds) by ear
flashCardData.example_1: Speak louder – I can’t hear you

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to do something with or for someone that he cannot do alone, or that he will find useful
flashCardData.example_1: He fell down and I helped him up.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to have in one’s hand(s) or between one’s hands
flashCardData.example_1: He held the mouse by its tail.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to want something to happen and have some reason to believe that it will or might happen
flashCardData.example_1: He’s very late, but we are still hoping he will come.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to take in or consider along with (other people, things etc) as part of a group, set etc
flashCardData.example_1: Your duties include making the tea.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to require; to bring as a result
flashCardData.example_1: His job involves a lot of travelling.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: not to give or throw away; to preserve
flashCardData.example_1: I kept the most interesting books

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to be aware of or to have been informed about
flashCardData.example_1: I know he is at home because his car is in the drives

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to guide or direct or cause to go in a certain direction
flashCardData.example_1: Follow my car and I’ll lead you to the motorway.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to go away or depart from, often without intending to return
flashCardData.example_1: They left at about six o’clock.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to allow or permit
flashCardData.example_1: She refused to let her children go out in the rain.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to be pleased with; to find pleasant or agreeable
flashCardData.example_1: I like the way you’ve decorated this room.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to have one’s home or dwelling (in a particular place)
flashCardData.example_1: They went to live in Bristol / in a huge house.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to turn the eyes in a certain direction so as to see, to find, to express etc
flashCardData.example_1: He looked out of the window.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to stop having; to have no longer
flashCardData.example_1: I have lost my watch.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to create, form or produce
flashCardData.example_1: I’m going to make lunch/coffee.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to receive or become conscious of a sound using your ears
flashCardData.example_1: She heard a noise outside.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Cô nghe thấy tiếng động bên ngoài.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to make it possible or easier for someone to do something, by doing part of the work yourself or by providing advice, money, support, etc
flashCardData.example_1: My dad said he would help with the costs of buying a house.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Bố tôi nói rằng ông sẽ giúp đỡ chi phí mua nhà.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to take and keep something in your hand or arms
flashCardData.example_1: Can you hold the bag while I open the door?
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Bạn có thể giữ cái túi trong khi tôi mở cửa không?

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to want something to happen or to be true, and usually have a good reason to think that it might
flashCardData.example_1: I'm hoping for an interview next week.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Tôi đang hy vọng cho một cuộc phỏng vấn vào tuần tới.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to contain something as a part of something else, or to make something part of something else
flashCardData.example_1: Tax and service are included in the bill.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Thuế và dịch vụ được bao gồm trong hóa đơn.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: If an activity, situation, etc. involves something, that thing is a part of the activity, etc.
flashCardData.example_1: Research involving the use of biological warfare agents will be used for defensive defensive purposes.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Nghiên cứu liên quan đến việc sử dụng các tác nhân chiến tranh sinh học sẽ được sử dụng cho mục đích phòng thủ phòng thủ.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to have or continue to have in your possession
flashCardData.example_1: Do you want this photograph back or can I keep it?
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Bạn có muốn bức ảnh này trở lại hoặc tôi có thể giữ nó?

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to have information in your mind
flashCardData.example_1: She knows the name of every kid in the school.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Cô ấy biết tên của mọi đứa trẻ trong trường.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to control a group of people, a country, or a situation
flashCardData.example_1: I've asked Gemma to lead the discussion.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Tôi đã yêu cầu Gemma dẫn dắt cuộc thảo luận.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to go away from someone or something, for a short time or permanently
flashCardData.example_1: The bus leaves in five minutes.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Xe buýt rời đi trong năm phút nữa.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to allow something to happen or someone to do something by not doing anything to stop an action or by giving your permission
flashCardData.example_1: She wanted to go but her parents wouldn't let her.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Cô ấy muốn đi nhưng bố mẹ cô ấy sẽ không cho phép cô ấy.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to enjoy or approve of something or someone
flashCardData.example_1: I like your new haircut.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Tôi thích kiểu tóc mới của bạn.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to have your home somewhere
flashCardData.example_1: Some students live on the University campus.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Một số sinh viên sống trong khuôn viên trường Đại học.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to direct your eyes in order to see
flashCardData.example_1: They looked at the picture and laughed.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Họ nhìn vào bức tranh và cười.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to no longer have something because you do not know where it is
flashCardData.example_1: I've lost my ticket.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Tôi đã làm mất vé của tôi.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: every time or all the time
flashCardData.example_1: She always spells my name wrong.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Cô ấy luôn đánh vần sai tên tôi.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: in the way that most often happens
flashCardData.example_1: I usually just have a sandwich for lunch.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Tôi thường chỉ có một chiếc bánh sandwich cho bữa trưa.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: often
flashCardData.example_1: I see him frequently.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Tôi gặp anh ấy thường xuyên.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: many times
flashCardData.example_1: I often see him in the garden.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Tôi thường thấy anh ấy trong vườn.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: on some occasions but not always or often
flashCardData.example_1: He sometimes goes to America.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Anh ấy thỉnh thoảng đi Mỹ.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: sometimes but not often
flashCardData.example_1: I see him occasionally in town.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Tôi thỉnh thoảng gặp anh ấy trong thị trấn.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: almost never
flashCardData.example_1: I seldom drive my car into the city.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Tôi hiếm khi lái xe vào thành phố.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: not often
flashCardData.example_1: I rarely go to bed before midnight.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Tôi hiếm khi đi ngủ trước nửa đêm.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: only just; almost not
flashCardData.example_1: We hardly ever go to concerts.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: CChúng tôi hầu như không bao giờ đi xem hòa nhạc.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: not at any time or not on any occasion
flashCardData.example_1: I shall never go there again.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Tôi sẽ không bao giờ đến đó một lần nữa.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: before the present time
flashCardData.example_1: I had already gone when Tom arrived.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Tôi đã đi khi Tom đến.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: recently
flashCardData.example_1: Have you seen her lately?
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Gần đây bạn có thấy cô ấy không?

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: continuing to happen or continuing to be done
flashCardData.example_1: I'm still hungry.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Tôi vẫn còn đói.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: (on) the day after today
flashCardData.example_1: I'm having dinner with Rachel tomorrow night.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Tôi sẽ ăn tối với Rachel vào tối mai.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: near the beginning of a period of time, or before the usual, expected, or planned time
flashCardData.example_1: If you finish early you can go home.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Nếu bạn hoàn thành sớm bạn có thể về nhà.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: at the present time, not in the past or future
flashCardData.example_1: I may eat something later, but I'm not hungry now.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Tôi có thể ăn gì đó sau, nhưng bây giờ tôi không đói.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: in or within a short time; before long; quickly
flashCardData.meaning: sớm thôi (chẳng bao lâu nữa, chẳng mấy chốc nữa)
flashCardData.example_1: It will soon be impossible for foreigners to enter the country.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Người nước ngoài sẽ sớm không thể vào nước này.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: (on) the day before today
flashCardData.example_1: I saw her yesterday afternoon.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Tôi thấy cô ấy chiều hôm qua.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: after a long time or some difficulty
flashCardData.example_1: We finally got home at midnight.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Cuối cùng chúng tôi về nhà lúc nửa đêm.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: not long ago, or at a time that started not long ago
flashCardData.example_1: He came to see me recently.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Anh ấy đến gặp tôi gần đây.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: in addition to; also
flashCardData.example_1: Do you play any other sports besides basketball?
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Bạn có chơi môn thể thao nào khác ngoài bóng rổ không?

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: despite whatever amount or degree
flashCardData.meaning: bất kể như thế nào (bất chấp số lượng hay mức độ)
flashCardData.example_1: If Emma likes something she shall buy it however much it costs.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Nếu Emma thích thứ gì đó, cô ấy sẽ mua nó bất kể giá bao nhiêu.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: next or after that
flashCardData.example_1: Let me finish this job, then we'll go.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Hãy để tôi hoàn thành công việc này, sau đó chúng ta sẽ đi.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: in place of someone or something else
flashCardData.meaning: thay vào đó, thay vì (ở vị trí của một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó khác)
flashCardData.example_1: We went by train instead of by car.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Chúng tôi đã đi bằng tàu hỏa thay vì bằng ô tô.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: (used to add information) also and more importantly
flashCardData.meaning: hơn nữa (được sử dụng để thêm thông tin)
flashCardData.example_1: The whole report is badly written. Moreover, it is inaccurate.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Toàn bộ báo cáo được viết rất tệ. Hơn nữa, nó không chính xác.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: in addition; more importantly
flashCardData.example_1: Furthermore, I should like to point out that we have an urgent deadline to meet.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Hơn nữa, tôi muốn chỉ ra rằng chúng ta có một thời hạn khẩn cấp phải đáp ứng.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: in, at, or to this place
flashCardData.example_1: London is only 50 miles from here.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Luân Đôn chỉ cách đây 50 dặm.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: (to, at, or in) that place
flashCardData.example_1: Put the chair there.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Đặt cái ghế ở đó.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to, at, or in all places or the whole of a place
flashCardData.example_1: I looked everywhere for my keys.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Tôi đã tìm khắp nơi để tìm chìa khóa của mình.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: (in or to) some place not known or not named
flashCardData.example_1: They live somewhere in London.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Họ sống đâu đó ở London.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: in, to, or at any place
flashCardData.meaning: bất cứ nơi nào, bất kỳ đâu
flashCardData.example_1: I was wondering if there was anywhere I could go to get this repaired.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Tôi đã tự hỏi nếu có bất cứ nơi nào tôi có thể đi để sửa chữa điều này.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: in, at, or to no place; not anywhere
flashCardData.meaning: không ở đâu cả, không nơi đâu
flashCardData.example_1: It was nowhere to be found.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Nó không thể được tìm thấy ở đâu cả.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: not far away
flashCardData.meaning: gần đó, gần đây (ở vị trí gần)
flashCardData.example_1: We stopped at some nearby shops to buy some food.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Chúng tôi dừng lại ở một số cửa hàng gần đó để mua một ít thức ăn.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: in or into a room, building, container, or something similar
flashCardData.example_1: She grabbed the bag and looked inside.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Cô ấy chộp lấy chiếc túi và nhìn vào bên trong.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: not in a particular building or room, but near it
flashCardData.example_1: She sat for two hours on the floor outside his room.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Cô ngồi suốt hai tiếng đồng hồ trên sàn nhà bên ngoài phòng anh ấy.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: continuously or repeatedly, or in a busy way
flashCardData.example_1: They worked away until dark.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Họ làm việc cho đến khi trời tối.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: completely
flashCardData.example_1: I'm sorry, the restaurant is fully booked.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Tôi xin lỗi, nhà hàng đã kín chỗ.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: quite; to a slight degree
flashCardData.example_1: The train was rather too crowded for a comfortable journey.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Tàu khá đông đúc cho một hành trình thoải mái.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: (used to add emphasis to an adjective or adverb) to a great degree or extremely
flashCardData.example_1: Think about it very carefully before deciding.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Hãy suy nghĩ về nó rất cẩn thận trước khi quyết định.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: very much or in a very serious way
flashCardData.example_1: I strongly advise you to apply for the job.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Tôi thực sự khuyên bạn nên nộp đơn xin việc.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: in an easy way
flashCardData.example_1: He explained it as simply as he could, but the class still did not understand.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Anh ấy giải thích nó đơn giản nhất có thể, nhưng cả lớp vẫn không hiểu.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: extremely or very much
flashCardData.example_1: She worked enormously hard on the project.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Cô ấy đã làm việc rất chăm chỉ cho dự án.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: very, to a large degree, or at a high level
flashCardData.meaning: mức độ cao, mức độ lớn
flashCardData.example_1: He has a highly-paid job as a company director.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Anh ấy có một công việc được trả lương cao là giám đốc công ty.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: nearly
flashCardData.example_1: It will cost almost as much to repair it as it would to buy a new one.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Chi phí sửa chữa nó sẽ gần bằng chi phí mua một cái mới.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: completely
flashCardData.example_1: You must be absolutely silent or the birds will not appear.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Bạn phải tuyệt đối im lặng nếu không lũ chim sẽ không xuất hiện.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: to the degree needed
flashCardData.example_1: He swam well enough to pass the test.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Anh ấy đã bơi đủ tốt để vượt qua bài kiểm tra.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: in a perfect way
flashCardData.example_1: The jacket fits perfectly, the skirt not so well.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Chiếc áo khoác vừa vặn hoàn hảo, chiếc váy không được vừa vặn lắm.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: completely
flashCardData.example_1: I admit it was entirely my fault.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Tôi thừa nhận đó hoàn toàn là lỗi của tôi.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: quite, but not extremely
flashCardData.example_1: I am pretty sure it was her.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Tôi khá chắc chắn đó là cô ấy.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: very
flashCardData.example_1: I am terribly pleased to hear that you've got a job.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Tôi rất vui khi biết rằng bạn đã có một công việc.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: used for emphasizing how surprising or unusual something is
flashCardData.example_1: It is a remarkably noisy and crowded city.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Đó là một thành phố ồn ào và đông đúc.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: completely
flashCardData.example_1: I enjoyed her new book though it's not quite as good as her last one.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Tôi rất thích cuốn sách mới của cô ấy mặc dù nó hoàn toàn không hay bằng cuốn trước của cô ấy.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: a little
flashCardData.example_1: She's slightly taller than her sister.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Cô ấy cao hơn chị gái mình một chút.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: in a way that shows that you feel angry with someone or about something
flashCardData.example_1: He slammed the car door shut angrily.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Anh tức giận đóng sầm cửa xe lại.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: in a brave way
flashCardData.example_1: She bravely went back into the burning building to rescue the dog.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Cô đã dũng cảm quay trở lại tòa nhà đang cháy để giải cứu chú chó.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: in a polite way
flashCardData.example_1: He politely opened the door for her.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Anh ấy lịch sự mở cửa cho cô ấy.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: without taking or showing enough care and attention
flashCardData.example_1: He told me off for driving carelessly.
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Anh ấy mắng tôi vì đã lái xe một cách cẩu thả.

flashCardData.definitionOfWord: with no difficulty or effort
flashCardData.example_1: She won the race easily..
flashCardData.example_1_vn: Cô ấy đã thắng cuộc đua một cách dễ dàng.
